bonuses.description: When the unit has a shield, damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Freeze damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Damage dealt by all allied units is increased by 4%, maximum of 3 stacks. The effect's potency is progressively reduced by 1% each time a new stack is applied.
Attack and max HP is increased by 4%.
At the start of the battle, the 2 allied units with the highest attack have their attack increased by 3%. Does not stack.
When attacked by enemy units with Electric debuffs, damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Electric damage dealt is increased by 5%.
When not protected by cover, damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Defense is increased by 8%.
When stability is greater than 0, max HP is increased by 12%.
When this unit's Physical Summon are on the field, allied units' defense is increased by 5%. Does not stack.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Physical damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Damage dealt by all allied units is increased by 4%, maximum of 3 stacks. The effect's potency is progressively reduced by 1% each time a new stack is applied.
Defense is increased by 8%.
At the start of the battle, the 2 allied units with the highest defense have their defense increased by 3%. Does not stack.
For every instance of Corrosion damage dealt by this unit, Corrosion damage dealt by all allied units is increased by 1%, maximum of 3%. Does not stack.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Corrosion damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Damage dealt by all allied units is increased by 4%, maximum of 3 stacks. This effect's potency is progressively reduced by 1% each time a new stack is applied.
Attack and max HP is increased by 4%.
At the start of the battle, the 2 allied units with the highest attack have their attack increased by 3%. Does not stack.
Damage dealt to enemy units with Electric debuffs is increased by 5%.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Electric damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Damage dealt to enemy targets with 50% or lower HP is increased by 10%.
Attack is increased by 8%.
After inflicting a critical hit, deals 3 points of fixed stability damage to the enemy target. This effect can trigger up to 2 times per turn.
Before an allied unit takes fatal damage, they recover HP equal to 8% of max HP. This effect can trigger up to once per turn. In addition, this effect can only trigger once per unit per turn.
Physical and phase damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Burn damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Damage dealt by all allied units is increased by 4%, maximum of 3 stacks. The effect's potency is progressively reduced by 1% each time a new stack is applied.
Attack and max HP is increased by 4%.
This unit's healing effects are increased by 12%.
Healing effects received by allies with 50% or lower HP is increased by 8%. Does not stack.

Damage dealt against enemy units that are more than 5 tiles away is increased by 12%.
